body:
Hi Chris ,  It works with me in simulate for City scene ,result is good but in nurbs masses ,the result could be improve by add loop subdivision it would be great if u make it easier with better result
you can benefit from ' Icarus  Project ' it give the option to bake with excellent result  [http://discourse.mcneel.com/t/new-project-icarus/28810](http://discourse.mcneel.com/t/new-project-icarus/28810) Looking Forward ,thanks :)
